code: import axios from'./axios';var authPath='/auth';var signIn=function signIn(data){return axios.post("".concat(authPath,"/signin"),data);};var signUp=function signUp(data){return axios.post("".concat(authPath,"/signup"),data);};var checkRefresh=function checkRefresh(refreshToken){return axios.post("".concat(authPath,"/check-token"),{refreshToken:refreshToken});};export default{signIn:signIn,signUp:signUp,checkRefresh:checkRefresh};
